azureLogAnalytics.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db') and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| where Counter in~ ('User connections', 'Active Temp Tables')
| summarize EndValue = max(Val) by Counter
| extend p = pack(Counter, EndValue)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db') and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| where Counter in~ ('Memory Grants Pending', 'Number of deadlocks/sec', 'Processes blocked')
| summarize (T, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Counter
| project-away T
| extend p = pack(Counter, EndValue)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db') and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| where tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) =~ 'total' and Counter in~ ('Data File(s) Size (KB)', 'Log File(s) Size (KB)', 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)')
| summarize (End, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Counter
| project-away End
| extend p = pack(Counter, EndValue)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db') and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| where Counter =~ 'Free Space in tempdb (KB)'
| summarize EndValue = min(Val) by Counter
| extend p = pack(Counter, EndValue)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db') and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| where Counter =~ 'Memory broker clerk size' and DbInstance =~ 'Buffer Pool'
| summarize (End, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Counter
| extend EndValue = EndValue * 8
| project-away End
| extend p = pack(Counter, EndValue)
| summarize bag=make_bag(p)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_instance_cpu_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg Instance CPU'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_cpu_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg CPU'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_instance_memory_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg Instance Memory'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_memory_usage_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg Memory'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_data_io_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg Data I/O'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats' and Name == 'avg_log_write_percent' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('primary' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize ['Avg Log Writes'] = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)

InsightsMetrics 
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace in~ ('sqlserver_azuredb_waitstats', 'sqlserver_waitstats') and Name =~ 'wait_time_ms'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(iff(Tags["database_name'"] == '', Tags["database_name"], Tags["database_name'"])), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), WaitType = tostring(Tags.wait_type), WaitCategory = tostring(Tags.wait_category)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and (Database == '$db' or '*' == '$db')
| order by Computer asc, Instance asc, Database asc, Namespace asc, Name asc, WaitType asc, TimeGenerated asc
| extend WaitCategory = iff(isempty(WaitCategory), "Other", WaitCategory)
| extend Val = iff(Computer == prev(Computer) and Instance == prev(Instance) and Database == prev(Database) and Namespace == prev(Namespace) and Name == prev(Name) and WaitType == prev(WaitType) and Val > prev(Val), Val - prev(Val), real(null))
| summarize Val = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), WaitCategory
| extend Val = iff(isnan(Val), real(0), Val)
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db'
| where Name =~ 'Transactions/sec' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') 
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| project-away SeriesName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db'
| where Name =~ 'User connections' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| project-away SeriesName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db'
| where Name =~ 'Batch requests/sec' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName

| project-away SeriesName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName

| project-away SeriesName

| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db'
| where Name =~ 'SQL re-compilations/sec' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance'

| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)

| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum = sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName

| project-away SeriesName

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' 
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Name = tostring(Tags.counter), Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db'
| where Name =~ 'Number of deadlocks/sec' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter()
| where Namespace == 'sqlserver_memory_clerks'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), ClerkType = tostring(Tags.clerk_type)
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| extend SeriesName = strcat(Instance, '/', Database)
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), SeriesName, ClerkType
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), ClerkType, SeriesName
| project-away SeriesName
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics 
| where $__timeFilter()
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize 
        ['Data file(s) size']= avgif(Val, Counter == 'Data File(s) Size (KB)'),
        ['Log file(s) size'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Log File(s) Size (KB)'),
        ['Log file(s) used size'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)'),
        ['Percent log used'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Percent Log Used')
    by SqlInstance, DbInstance

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Data File(s) Size (KB)'
| summarize Average = round(avg(Val), 2), Max = round(max(Val), 2), Min = round(min(Val), 2), P99th = round(percentile(Val, 99), 2), P95th = round(percentile(Val, 95), 2) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| project-away DbInstance
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Log File(s) Size (KB)'
| summarize Average = round(avg(Val), 2), Max = round(max(Val), 2), Min = round(min(Val), 2), P99th = round(percentile(Val, 99), 2), P95th = round(percentile(Val, 95), 2) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| project-away DbInstance
| order by TimeGenerated asc

| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)

| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Log File(s) Used Size (KB)'

| project-away DbInstance

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Percent Log Used'
| summarize Average = round(avg(Val), 2), Max = round(max(Val), 2), Min = round(min(Val), 2), P99th = round(percentile(Val, 99), 2), P95th = round(percentile(Val, 95), 2) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| project-away DbInstance
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics 
| where $__timeFilter()
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize (Start, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (End, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Counter, Database, SqlInstance, DbInstance, bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval)
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize 
        ['Write Transactions/sec'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Write Transactions/sec'),
        ['Log Flushes/sec'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Log Flushes/sec'),
        ['Log Bytes Flushed/sec'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Log Bytes Flushed/sec'),
        ['Log Flush Wait Time'] = avgif(Val, Counter == 'Log Flush Wait Time')
    by SqlInstance, DbInstance

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Write Transactions/sec'
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| project-away DbInstance
| order by TimeGenerated asc

| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)

| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Log Flushes/sec'
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance

| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)

| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Log Bytes Flushed/sec'
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_performance' and tostring(Tags.object) endswith ':Databases' and tostring(Tags.instance) !~ 'total'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Counter = tostring(Tags.counter), DbInstance = tostring(Tags.instance)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and DbInstance == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and Counter == 'Log Flush Wait Time'
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize Sum=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), DbInstance
| project-away DbInstance
| order by TimeGenerated asc

InsightsMetrics 
| where $__timeFilter()
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_database_io'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), FileType = tostring(Tags.file_type), FileName = tostring(Tags.logical_filename)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE')
| summarize (Start, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (End, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by Name, Database, SqlInstance, FileType, FileName
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize
        DataReadBytes = sumif(Val, Name == 'read_bytes' and FileType == 'DATA'),
        DataWriteBytes = sumif(Val, Name == 'write_bytes' and FileType == 'DATA'),
        DataReadLatency = avgif(Val, Name == 'read_latency_ms' and FileType == 'DATA'),
        DataWriteLatency = avgif(Val, Name == 'write_latency_ms' and FileType == 'DATA'),
        LogReadBytes = sumif(Val, Name == 'read_bytes' and FileType == 'LOG'),
        LogWriteBytes = sumif(Val, Name == 'write_bytes' and FileType == 'LOG'),
        LogReadLatency = avgif(Val, Name == 'read_latency_ms' and FileType == 'LOG'),
        LogWriteLatency = avgif(Val, Name == 'write_latency_ms' and FileType == 'LOG')
    by SqlInstance, Database
    | project-reorder LogReadBytes, LogWriteBytes, LogReadLatency, LogWriteLatency, DataReadBytes, DataWriteBytes, DataReadLatency, DataWriteLatency, Database

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_database_io'
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), SqlInstance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), FileType = tostring(Tags.file_type)
| extend Database = iff(isempty(Database), SqlInstance, Database)
| where SqlInstance == '$SqlInstance' and Database == '$db' and Tags.replica_updateability == iff('$Replica' == 'secondary', 'READ_ONLY', 'READ_WRITE') and FileType == 'LOG' and Name == 'reads'
| summarize (StartTime, StartValue) = arg_min(TimeGenerated, Val), (EndTime, EndValue) = arg_max(TimeGenerated, Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), Database
| extend Val = iff(EndValue >= StartValue, EndValue - StartValue, real(null))
| summarize ["Sum"]=sum(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, $__interval), Database
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project-away Database

list.definition:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics | where Namespace contains 'sqlserver_server_properties' and Name == 'engine_edition'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Val == 5 | summarize by Instance
| project value = Instance, label = Instance, selected = true
list.label: Server
list.name: SqlInstance
list.query:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics | where Namespace contains 'sqlserver_server_properties' and Name == 'engine_edition'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| where Val == 5 | summarize by Instance
| project value = Instance, label = Instance, selected = true

list.definition:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace contains 'sqlserver_server_properties' and Name == 'uptime'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Replica = tostring(iff(Tags.replica_updateability == 'READ_WRITE', 'primary', 'secondary'))
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance =~ '$SqlInstance'
| distinct Database
list.label: Database
list.name: db
list.query:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace contains 'sqlserver_server_properties' and Name == 'uptime'
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance), Replica = tostring(iff(Tags.replica_updateability == 'READ_WRITE', 'primary', 'secondary'))
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance =~ '$SqlInstance'
| distinct Database

list.definition:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats'
| summarize by value = tostring(iff(Tags.replica_updateability == 'READ_WRITE', 'primary', 'secondary'))
| project value, label = value, selected = true
| order by label asc
list.name: Replica
list.query:
workspace("$ws").InsightsMetrics
| extend Tags = todynamic(Tags)
| extend Database = tostring(Tags.database_name), Instance = tostring(Tags.sql_instance)
| extend DatabaseKey = iff(Database == Instance, Database, strcat(Database, ' on ', Instance))
| where Instance == '$SqlInstance'
| where Namespace =~ 'sqlserver_azure_db_resource_stats'
| summarize by value = tostring(iff(Tags.replica_updateability == 'READ_WRITE', 'primary', 'secondary'))
| project value, label = value, selected = true
| order by label asc
